title: Why do 50s and 60s TV stars seem so lean? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because they were lean. Not just TV stars, but average Americans. Just watch an old episode of You Bet Your Life on YouTube and you'll see what I mean. At the beach in the 50s   The obesity epidemic in America corresponds with the prevalence of ultra-processed food in the American diet. Ultra-processed food now comprises over 60% of American grocery purchases, and on top of this, Americans are eating more fast food than ever.
